snippet: The police said the man had written blog posts expressing admiration for the two teenagers who carried out an attack at Columbine High School in 1999.
abstract: Spanish police say they have arrested man suspected of planning bomb attack on a university campus in Barcelona, inspired by 1999 mass killing at Columbine High School.
lead_paragraph: The police said the man had written blog posts expressing admiration for the two teenagers who carried out an attack at Columbine High School in 1999.

headline.seo: Man Accused of Planning Bombing in in Spain
headline.main: Man Accused of Planning Bomb Attack in Spain
headline.print_headline: Spain: Bomb Plot Foiled, Police Say
